sentences.sContent: The entrances are guarded by watchful security staff.
sentences.sCn: 入口处由警惕的保安人员把守。

sentences.sContent: ...children who are watchful will be better able to stay away from Unsafe situations...
...and how to avoid unsafe situations by being watchful and on their toes...
...Then there’s the whole question of whether modern parents are more watchful and nervous about safety than previous generations...

trans.tranOther: very careful to notice what is happening, and to make sure that everything is all right
